tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Hip Resurfacing,Hip Replacement,Knee Braces For Osteoarthritis,Knee Replacement,Joint Replacement Surgery,
review:
My mother chikkamma was seriously suffering from knee pain from past three years. I didn't get any chance to meet people who boost my confidence and refer to good orthopedic surgeon for total knee replacement.
To ease out my mom's pain I browsed the Google intensively and preferred to have an opinion with Dr.Prashanth. Mr.Franklin Anthony who is very generous, helpful, supportive and soft spoken fixed an appointment with Doctor.
Doctor educated us about Robotic surgery and boosted our confidence, with good faith and Grace of God I fixed the date of Total Knee Replacement surgery on that moment only.
Dr. Prashanth by virtue "Vydyo Narayana Harihi". Doctor is dignified, confident, calm, graceful, helpful, courteous, polite, understanding, gentle, very encouraging, boosts one's confidence, highly professional, highly skilled, 100 percent success in surgery, clears all the doubt pertains to orthopedic ailment and over all easily approachable.
All the treatment I took was on higher side still it is very reasonable compared to other hospital. In hospital good care taken, hygienic, and give awesome facility. Being a person like me who doesn't have any medical back ground and without any influence Doctor treated us very well who is the person of ethics to serve the people and relieved from hospital by easing out pain with total knee replacement surgery with 100 percent success.
I highly recommend the services of Dr,Prashanth to any patient orthopedic  
related issues.
Thank you so much Dr,Prashanth sir, for serving us. You the savior of the poor and needy people on earth. Let God bless you Doctor to reach more and more people in the world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife was suffering from knee pain from past 4 years, during this period I met many orthopaedic doctors in Bangalore, they gave her pain killers and other medication for cartilage.
I visited Dr. Prashant at Specialist Hospital in August 2022, he asked me to get my wife X-Ray done for both legs.  He saw the X-Rays and suggested for Bilateral Total Knee Replacement and explained me in detail.  I arranged for the funds and had the surgery done on 8/8/2022.  Know she is 
doing fine.
I recommend doctor Prashant and his team to anyone who wants to perform knee surgery, they are professionals in dong Robotic surgeries at an affordable price.

tags: Value for money,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Prashant R , smart and *********** would be an understatement to describe him. I had approached Dr.Prashanth when I was going through critical and acute pain in my back. The diagnosis was I had nerve inflammation on my back due to artho viral fever and severe vitamin and calcium deficiency in me. I was suffering from this pain for a month long but Dr. Prashant's magical treatment like I say, cured me of this back pain in 2weeeks with minimal medication. He knows how to treat his patients well. He is very courteous,polite and highly professional when he is interacting with patients. I recommend Dr. Prashant R for any kind of Orthopaedic issues you have, trust me he will bring you back to life. Thank you so much Dr.Prashanth you are my saviour.

tags: None
review: My dad Mr.Lakshman Rao was suffering from extreme pain in foot & knee for about 2 years. Tried allopathy, ayurvedic medicines as well as therapies & massages, which gave him no relief. We consulted Dr.Prashanth about a month back & its worked wonders within a week for my dad with his diagnosis & medicine. I am happy to be taking my time out to give this feedback & would certainly recommend Dr.Prashanth to any patient with Orthopedic diagnosed ailments. Charm on his face seemed to be a magic wand above all,most essential for a doctor.

tags: None
review:
Doctor is awesome but I have advice for doctor and  hospital staff.

I called multiple times just to get registration no of doctor for which they behaved like I am asking his bank locker number. They just transferred my call from one department to another. After calling 10 times finally I got the number.

This is basic ethics to print it on prescription letter. What is there to hide ??

tags: None
review: He is definitely the doctor you want to go/take your loved ones. He knows how to take care and how to give make patient aware as what is the best. Its not because my Mother's surgery was success, it because how much he has won the trust of my Mother. If you have any ortho question, I am pretty sure, you won't find anyone as good as Dr.Prasanth. A terrific blend of technology, knowledge and someone we used to call "DOCTOR"

tags: None
review: Very good doctor but WORST hospital service,  completely mismanaged. The X Ray room is like a railway station ticket booth, no one to manage the patients. No one here cares for the patient.  I would definitely see this doctor somewhere else given a option.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: A very wonderful experience to relate with such doctor's. Dr. Prashanth is wonderful person to approach. Has lot of knowledge, experience, technique to deal with all patients of different ages.Started the treatment for my wife but ended up with the whole family consulting him for the Ortho related issues.A definitely recommended Dr. for Ortho related illnesses. The treatment is also quite remedial. Trustworthy health consultant. Worth the money. Simple!

review: He is simply a nice doctor. He brought me back walking on my feet which i fractured right before 6 months of my marriage. The treatment was so absolutely right that I gained the confidence and he also helped me to fight against my physical situation and boosted my confidence against fear of losing rhythm of proper walking.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor instils confidence in the patient.  Does not give unnecessary medicines or test prescriptions. He will use the x-rays/tests when it is really required. What can heal naturally,  he would let it heal naturally. Best doctor met till date without any monetary benefits. 
Go for him if you don't want to get into undue hassle of thousands of tests and medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Prasanth was no less than God for us, when we visited him the first time in an emergency when my dad had an accident and had a critically broken leg.
He needed immediate attention and was profusely bleeding. Doctor handled the case with calm and grace and instilled confidence in all our family members who were at the hospital. The surgery was done and every detail of it was explained to us as to what was the condition of the leg and what has been done.
He doesn't give unnecessary medicines and emphasises on exercises, food habits and natural healing processes. In 2 months, father started walking using walker and in next 2 months he started to walk even without it. It was purely based on the confidence given by the doctor to my dad. Now he visits the doctor for follow ups from another state  (since he is based in another state; that's the quality and friendliness). All the treatment was done at a fair rate, it was not at all expensive.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
